main event: An extremely large bright light was observed at 9:30 P.M. on 22/10/1967 near Lebanon, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was observed to be stationary at a 120-degree elevation,The object did not disappear during the observation,The witness reported no sound emanating from the object,The estimated distance of the object was about 2-5 miles away,The witness compared the size of the object to a large light bulb with a streamer running from it.
